channel.title: Kysa on Aggregated Thinking
channel.description: Recent content in Kysa on Aggregated Thinking

item.title: Civic Stories - December 2012
item.description: I sort of miss being in the backseat. A lot of my goofing off years have been conducted within the confines of the passenger doors, backside of the front seats, and the backseat. [gallery columns=“4” type=“rectangular” ids=“3012,3011,3010,3009,3008,3007,3006,3005,3004,3003”]

item.title: Kysa Knows
item.description:
Well here are a couple of shots of our princess, who was trying to finish off her purchases so she can brush teeth and sleep already. She’s tried doing some blogging in her spare time (I think this is a good thing for her) and you can follow her here.
Nomnomnom! First shot settings were F/7.1, ISO-400, shutter speed of 0.81sec
Next shot used F/2.8, ISO-400, and shutter speed of 1/10sec.

item.title: Breakfast after early morning church service
item.description: Miguel’s mama took one look at the pictures he… Jon Doblados - Aug 0, 2010Miguel’s mama took one look at the pictures here and decided to give him a haircut when we got home. Will post new pics when he wakes up from his morning nap. :) astig, pero cute pa rin. sabi ng kasambahay dito, based on her experience, kakapal daw ang buhok kung kakalbuhin Ah, but we only trimmed his hair.

item.title: Breakfast after early morning church service
After a busy afternoon of play, Ate Kysa attended to her brother and shared a meal with him.
item.description: You’re so lucky Miguel. Cute ka na, may ate ka… Anonymous - May 6, 2010You’re so lucky Miguel. Cute ka na, may ate ka pa like Kysa. Thank you Auntie. Indeed he’s blessed to have an Ate who is so fond of him. She’s as much of a blessing to us as well. :)

item.title: After a busy afternoon of play, Ate Kysa attended to her brother and shared a meal with him.
